TEST.0.title: 2023 North Carolina Division B Regional 5
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

 
 
 
School Name:

Check your team:  ◻ Varsity     ◻ JV1      JV2     ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.293.cipherString: Deliberate with caution, but act with decision; and yield with graciousness, or oppose with firmness.
CIPHER.293.question: A quote from COLTON has been encoded as an Aristocrat, what does it say? When you have solved it, raise your hand so that the time can be recorded and the solution checked.

CIPHER.308.cipherString: Success without happiness is a mirage of life.
CIPHER.308.question: A quote by Debasish Mridha has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote starts with SUCCESS.

CIPHER.301.cipherString: A dishonest man you can always trust to be dishonest.
CIPHER.301.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Johnny Depp using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.298.cipherString: Eye recently heared about a manakin that lost all of his freinds becuse he was so clothes minderd!
CIPHER.298.question: Your friend offered you some advice in the form of a Cryptogram, but they are a terrible speller. You are told it contains the word CLOTHES.

CIPHER.316.cipherString: Often it does seem such a pity that Noah and his party did not miss the boat.
CIPHER.316.question: Decode a quote by Mark Twain that has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher. You are told that between 3 and 5 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.306.cipherString: The deeper a thing is, the more interesting it is
CIPHER.306.question: A quote by Richard Feynman has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 7=×●, 1=–●, 5=×–, 2=●●, 4=–×

CIPHER.313.cipherString: The more I live, the more I learn. The more I learn, the more I realize, the less I know.
CIPHER.313.question: Solve this quote from Michel Legrand which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.296.cipherString: Finding the lesson behind every adversity will be the one important thing that helps get you through it.
CIPHER.296.question: Decode a quote by Roy T. Bennett that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K1 alphabet. You are told that the quote contains the word THING.

CIPHER.317.cipherString: Every gift, though small, is in reality great, if it be given with affection.
CIPHER.317.question: A quote by Philemon has been encoded using the Rail Fence Cipher for you to decode. You are told that between 3 and 5 rails were used to encode it.

CIPHER.315.cipherString: A man is known by the books he reads.
CIPHER.315.question: The following quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson needs to be encoded with the Affine Cipher using a=7 and b=4.

CIPHER.303.cipherString: Desde el momento en que tomé tu libro hasta que lo dejé, me convulsioné de la risa. Algún día pienso leerlo.
CIPHER.303.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Groucho Marx into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword. You are told that DRBC maps to TOEN.
CIPHER.303.translation: From the moment I picked your book up until I laid it down I was convulsed with laughter. Some day I intend reading it.

CIPHER.300.cipherString: In the end you should always do the right thing even if it's hard.
CIPHER.300.question: The following symbols encodes a phrase by Nicholas Sparks using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?

CIPHER.295.cipherString: Be idealistic about the future, be realistic about the present, and never forget the lessons of the past.
CIPHER.295.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by Dean F. Wilson which has the word FORGET in it.

CIPHER.307.cipherString: Those who know the least want to be heard the most.
CIPHER.307.question: A quote by Mokokoma Mokhonoana has been encoded using the Morbit Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=×●, 8=●×, 5=●–, 9=×–, 4=–●, 6=××

CIPHER.314.cipherString: It is the greatest possible praise to be praised by a man who is himself deserving of praise.
CIPHER.314.question: Encode this quote from the Latin using the Atbash Cipher.

CIPHER.309.question: After solving the cryptarithm DIARY+TEXT=MEMOIR decode the phrase 9326510 136857.

CIPHER.310.cipherString: In every profession the daily and common duties are the most useful.
CIPHER.310.question: The following quote needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of WRITE

CIPHER.311.cipherString: Give a bowl of rice to a man and you will feed him for a day. Teach him how to grow his own rice and you will save his life.
CIPHER.311.question: Solve this quote from Confucius which has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher.

CIPHER.305.cipherString: Rockets are cool. There's no getting around that.
CIPHER.305.question: A quote by Elon Musk has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 1=●, 3=–, 6=●, 4=×, 8=–, 2=×

CIPHER.294.cipherString: Being thankful should be an unwritten rule of life because there are several things to be thankful for.
CIPHER.294.question: Solve this Aristocrat which is a quote by John Franks which has the word THINGS in it.

CIPHER.304.cipherString: Our lives are just a journey back to THE LIGHT
CIPHER.304.question: A quote by Maria Koszler has been encoded using the Pollux Cipher for you to decode. You are told that 9=●, 5=×, 7=–, 1=×, 4=●

CIPHER.299.cipherString: We prepare ourselves for sudden deeds by the reiterated choice of good or evil, that gradually determines character.
CIPHER.299.question: A famous phrase from George Eliot has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K1 alphabet. You are told that letters RBCGD map to MINES.

CIPHER.302.cipherString: I don't even butter my bread; I consider that cooking.
CIPHER.302.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Katherine Cebrian using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text ends with KING

CIPHER.297.cipherString: We can prostrate ourselves in the dust when we have committed a fault, but it is not best to remain there.
CIPHER.297.question: Decode a quote by CHATEAUBRIAND that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher and a K2 alphabet. You are told that it ends with THERE.

CIPHER.312.cipherString: A man has a hard time feeling fulfilled when he lives a life that does not serve a purpose that is more than himself.
CIPHER.312.question: Solve this quote from Janvier Chouteu-Chando which has been encoded with the Caesar Cipher.
